name: postprandially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
after eating: There is evidence that fatty meals may cause cholesterol to be elevated for many hours postprandially. Analysis was performed on blood samples obtained 30 minutes postprandially. A few people were slumped post-prandially in armchairs by the fire.
More examplesFewer examplesA cough when eating and postprandially may indicate a reflux cough.Patients should monitor their glucose readings several times a day: before meals, 2 hours postprandially, and at bedtime.We suggest that this port should be drunk postprandially.
